typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	param1 as string
}
source(output(
		empid as integer,
		name as string,
		gender as string,
		salary as integer,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer') ~> source1
source1 filter(name==$param1) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['abcd.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
